description:
The leading WebAssembly Runtime supporting WASI and Emscripten

Wasmer is a fast and secure WebAssembly runtime that enables super lightweight containers to run anywhere: from Desktop to the Cloud, Edge and IoT devices.
This release adds support for a more fine-grained and flexible control over the network sandbox. Also, some bug fixes and improvements are included.
Added
- #5274 feat(config): Add (Named)PackageIdent::matches_id helpers
Changed
- #5288 Bump up macos runner versions
- #5283 Better network sandbox
- #5243 Support multiple heterogeneous backends at the same time
- #5275 Protect preopened inodes from being closed
- #5264 update running wasmer-integration-tests in CI
Fixed
